title: [Self-directed] Child Abuse Prevention Education: Multimedia-based Practitioner Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of child psychology and fundamental sex education principles
context.additional_context: Cultivating practical skills for current professionals to create and deliver immediately applicable educational content in child protection settings

learning_goals: Learners can explain the five core principles of child abuse prevention education.
Learners can design at least three educational scenarios incorporating multimedia elements (videos, animations, interactive activities).
Learners can suggest methods for measuring educational effectiveness using formative assessment tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
